um you know most documentaries at least
when I were growing up were sort of like

hardly good tasting they were just

were the expression of an already
arrived at end not a process of

learned there's a huge big difference
there's um there's a subtle ingredient
of enthusiasm that is a part of that uh
an excitement of the new story that
which is not known Harry Truman once

Bend and not knowing precisely how deep

higher in which the whole is indeed

it's that again calculus that I am so
interested in so every project is a

that excitement of of something new that
